meanings: a picture, a painting, a drawing

vlive.korean: 오빠 화낸다? I am going to get angry. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: I am going to get angry.

vlive.korean: 많이 화내도 돼요? 그럼? I can get angry a lot? Then? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🐰🎂♥️
vlive.english: I can get angry a lot? Then?

vlive.korean: 저 화내는 모습 좋아요? 진짜요? You like me getting angry? Really? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🐰🎂♥️
vlive.english: You like me getting angry? Really?

vlive.korean: 여러분 저 지금 굉장히 화가 나거든요? Everyone I am very mad right now. 듣기 View video SF9 : 어머님들
vlive.english: Everyone I am very mad right now.

vlive.korean: 화낼 때 언성이 높아지냐고요? Do I tend to raise my voice when I argue? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈입니다!
vlive.english: Do I tend to raise my voice when I argue?

examples.korean: She thrust past him angrily and left. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 화를 내며 그를 밀치고 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: His lies made her bristle with rage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 거짓말에 그녀가 화가 나서 발끈했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She stomped angrily out of the office. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 화가 나서 쿵쿵거리며 사무실을 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stomped angrily out of the office. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Jan slammed her fist on the desk in anger. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얀은 화가 나서 주먹으로 책상을 쾅 내리쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Jan slammed her fist on the desk in anger. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She got angry and socked him in the mouth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 화가 나서 그의 입을 한 대 갈겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
